message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counteroffer at $105 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! I can see you're interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $115 for the product. This price allows me to save some money while still getting a good deal.
I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $120, but I think I can do better than that. I'll sell it to you for $128.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll sell it to you for $135.
